favourite.article: Jesus only is the way to help anyone who call and come to Him. His blood is for healing and deliverance. His name is power that any two edged sword. Thank You Lord for Your name in my life.

Jesus only You and only You alone will ever and ever be my all & all. You have captured me, pls continue to capture me well. Never let me escape from Your hand because there is great joy in relationship with You. This song is a refreshment for me. Jesus only, my Jesus ever You will be. I will ever be grateful to You for making me in discipleship class in Okota.

Jesus only is our message. We have nothing else to preach. "But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed. As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed." (Gal. 1:8-9) Lord, Please make us faithful to this call.
Wow wow wow.this reminds me of Pastor Kumuyi May God bless.
This song is more than the words can mean, I like every stanza.
The best song of my life.

Savior, sanctifier and healer, Jesus only, Jesus ever. I thank Him for saving my soul and I pray we all attain His fullness even unto perfection. This hymn is really good. Transcendence is intrinsic in it.

This is Deeper Life first song - in every Retreat. I am just preparing to play it before I came across this. It's unbeatable. Jesus only, Jesus all, Jesus ever. Jesus is and will be the centre of attraction when saints gather from every shore...
Indeed Jesus is everything I need!
Jesus only is all we need. I pray that God will give all of us the grace to always be "looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith" in Jesus' name.
I love this hymn and always remind me of whom Jesus. It also remind me programs at ayobo.

It gives me joy and great hope when I realised how blessed I am to know that JESUS ONLY is all I need. Thanks to my pastor and father in the Lord who has over the years place emphasis on the evergreen message. Indeed JESUS ONLY is our message, and JESUS EVER we will seek!

Unfortunately, the church has departed from this main message: Jesus Only. May our leaders in Christ return to Him so that they can lead us right in Jesus name. Thank God for the writer of this hymn. May his/her descendants in blood and in spirit be blessed for ever. Amen.
This song lifts my soul whenever the choir renders it.
I believed all day long, and all of my life that Jesus only, my Savior, Sanctifier, Healer and King. Today I live in faith with Jesus and tomorrow I will die gaining His promise.

I like the hymn. We used to sing quite often at Deeper Life Church Nigeria. It is like an anthem there. Jesus is our everything. We must always look unto Him. He is the Author and Finisher of our faith. It is very possible to shift focus from Him and turn to methods, men etc. But we must never forget that He died and paid the full price for whatever we may need. We love You Jesus, our Saviour, Our Sanctifier, Our Healer and Coming King.

ONLY JESUS, Amen. Only if we keep our focus and attention to the things that would glorify God and deny ourselves then our mission to reach out the nations will be fast accomplished. “Let us exalt His name together”
The song reminds me of the Deeper Life Campus Fellowship Congresses at IBTC Ayobo. As a pastor today, it still brings tears to my eyes as it reminds me to keep the focus on Christ at all times.
I love this song so much. It draws me closer to God any time I listen to the song or I sang it. It is satisfying and pleasing to my soul.

This song brings tears to me every time I listened to it... Brethren, let our life, lifestyle, character, hidden or open, people present or no one around, let it SPEAK JESUS. We are the Bible the whole world is reading. Let our whole life so reflect and carry the message: JESUS ONLY, JESUS ONLY, JESUS ONLY.
This reminds me of Deeper Life Campus Fellowship Congresses at IBTC, Lagos. Indeed, Jesus only is all in all for us. We love Him-the coming King
Yes, I truly testify that it is JESUS ONLY, HE OUR SAVIOR, HEALER, SANCTIFIER, and COMING KING. Receive Him in your heart today, my friend.

This song reminds me of my early years as a Christian when I was first taught it. Yet it it still relevant to every message we preach be it a posperity, holiness, or salvation. I was reminded of this song today by this Scripture that keeps cominig to my heart. John 12:20-23. V21 in particular says 'Sir, we would like to see Jesus' I pray that all those trying to find Jesus today will see Him. And one day we shall all see Him in person. Sis Nike I read your comment. Just to encourage you, keep on preaching Jesus. Where His presence is absence, the Bible say we should not be. Thank God the celebrant invited Jesus to his wedding when wine ran out. And as wine will run out one day in every marriage, every married couple better make sure that Jesus is invited.
AMEN. Jesus our Savior. we need come to Him deep in our heart something refreshing, energize. Our morning revival it vitalizes us.

This song reminds me that Jesus should be central to my life. Once a course mate accused me of being 'too Christian'. She was angry that I brought Jesus into everything. Not deliberate but naturally, when we live the life that we should now live in Christ who loved us so much and died for us, we can't but have him as the theme of everything, He will have to be our only message.
